lead_paragraph: A report in some editions of the Goal soccer roundup on Tuesday about England’s new all-white uniforms misidentified the team’s opponent on Saturday and the location of the match, and misstated England’s designation for the uniforms. The opponent was Slovakia, not Slovenia; the match was in London, not Slovenia; and the uniforms are worn for home games, not away matches.
